items.name: Wajir County Cultural Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant new center dedicated to preserving and showcasing the rich Somali and Borana cultures of Wajir through exhibitions, performances, and workshops.
items.address: Off Griftu Road, Wajir Town Centre

items.name: Shalaale Desert Eco-Park
items.short_description: A newly designated eco-park promoting sustainable tourism and offering guided walks to observe unique desert flora and fauna, including rare bird species native to the arid landscape.

items.name: Wajir Innovation & Tech Centre
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility providing co-working spaces, training programs, and incubation support for young entrepreneurs in Wajir's growing tech and startup scene.
items.address: Korahei Road, Near Wajir County Government Offices

items.name: Lagh Bogal Green Oasis
items.short_description: A community-led reforestation and water harvesting project transformed into a serene public park, offering shaded picnic spots and a children's play area along the seasonal riverbed.
items.address: Along Lagh Bogal seasonal riverbed, South Wajir

items.name: Wajir Modern Bazaar
items.short_description: A newly constructed, organized market complex offering a wide array of local goods, fresh produce, and handicrafts in a clean, vibrant, and bustling environment.
items.address: Opposite Wajir Bus Park, Wajir Town

items.name: Orahey Wildlife Viewing Point
items.short_description: An elevated platform and designated area providing safe observation of local wildlife, particularly around watering holes during seasonal migrations, offering unique photography opportunities.
items.address: 30 km North of Wajir Town, off Wajir-Mandera Road

items.name: Wajir Public Library & Resource Centre
items.short_description: A contemporary library offering a vast collection of books, digital resources, and dedicated study areas, promoting literacy and lifelong learning in the county.
items.address: Next to Wajir County Referral Hospital

items.name: Soko Mjinga Food Court
items.short_description: A hygienic and diverse food court gathering various local eateries under one roof, offering traditional Somali dishes, grilled meats, and refreshing beverages in a communal setting.
items.address: Off Wajir-Garissa Road, near Central Market

items.name: Wajir Sports & Recreation Complex
items.short_description: A newly built multi-purpose sports facility featuring modern football pitches, basketball courts, and a community gym, encouraging healthy lifestyles and local sports talent.

items.name: Old Wajir Fort Interpretive Centre
items.short_description: Built adjacent to the historic Old Wajir Fort, this center provides detailed historical context, recovered artifacts, and interactive displays about the fort's colonial past and its regional significance.
items.address: Near Old Wajir Fort, Wajir Town
